articles.description: More popular than Picasso and Leonardo Da Vinci among AI artists, Greg Rutkowski opted out of the Stable Diffusion training set. The community just created a LoRA to mimic his style.
articles.content:
Digital artist Greg Rutkowski wants nothing to do with art created using artificial intelligence, but AI art creators won't leave him alone.
Known for his vivid, surreal style, Rukowski is immensely… [+3685 chars]
